name: Cerdocornio
description: The Galaxy is in Danger once again, but this time it's gonna be saved by the Most huggable hero of the History. Get into the Shoot’em up where you have to use all your skills in Calculate the perfect Timing with the Jump-Shoot...
minimum_requirements: 最低配備: 作業系統: Window XP or better 處理器: 1.6 GHz 記憶體: 512 MB 記憶體 顯示卡: Shader model 2.0 with 128MB of VRAM DirectX: 版本：9.0c 儲存空間: 800 MB 可用空間

reviews.review_text: Saw unicorn. Bought unicorn. Played unicorn. Killed Unicorn. Loved Unicorn.
